name: dark
description: Tema oscuro con fondo azul nocturno profundo

pyqt5.stylesheet: QWidget { background-color: #0D0F22; color: #E2E8F0; } QTabWidget::pane { border: 1px solid #2C3549; background-color: #1B2233; } QTabBar::tab { background-color: #1B2233; color: #E2E8F0; padding: 8px 16px; border: 1px solid #2C3549; border-bottom: none; } QTabBar::tab:selected { background-color: #38BDF8; color: #FFFFFF; } QTabBar::tab:hover { background-color: #2C3549; } QPushButton { background-color: #38BDF8; color: #FFFFFF; border: none; padding: 8px 16px; border-radius: 4px; font-weight: bold; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: #0EA5E9; } QPushButton:disabled { background-color: #2C3549; color: #64748B; } QLabel { color: #E2E8F0; } QLineEdit, QComboBox { background-color: #1E293B; color: #E2E8F0; border: 1px solid #334155; padding: 5px; border-radius: 4px; } QComboBox:disabled { background-color: #2C3549; color: #64748B; } QComboBox::drop-down { border: none; } QComboBox QAbstractItemView { background-color: #1E293B; color: #E2E8F0; selection-background-color: #38BDF8; } QProgressBar { border: 1px solid #2C3549; border-radius: 4px; text-align: center; background-color: #1E293B; color: #E2E8F0; } QProgressBar::chunk { background-color: #38BDF8; }
